name: Protect the Plus
description:
In the game, you need to score as many points as possible, and also protect the plus from yourself.

-DO NOT SHOOT PLUS.
-Control is carried out only with the mouse. 
-A double click changes your angle of movement, there is an arrow tip upward, it shows where you will direct yourself after a double click. 
-By pressing and holding, you can change the direction of fire.
-Automatic shooting.
-Obstacles spawn randomly
